ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I gained a rich and deep insight into the energy sector across many disciplines. It taught me skills for reading and interpreting complex data, and conducting research into energy related topics.
This course covered a wide variety of approaches to understanding energy and tangential industries.

This was a really nice overview of world energy, and it gave me a much better grip on the overall global situation. It didn't go too deep, but gave me a good base for future energy studies and was a fun way to engage with energy discussions with other people who shared my interests.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: This course is an amazing course for Energy Studies students. It provides broad background applicable to every area of energy. Overall the course was very enjoyable and is a must take for any Energy Studies student.
I thought this course was incredibly strong, engaging, and well organized.

This class was great! It could probably benefit from some more organization or interconnectedness week-to-week, but the class still flowed pretty well! I liked how the differing weekly topics kept it interesting.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes ! This is a great course for anyone interested in energy, no matter what specific topic within energy you are interested in. It covers many topics to provide a holistic view of the field.
YES!! It is very fun, and Prof Oristaglio is great! If you're interested in energy and looking for a chill seminar, this is a good class.
